scripts.precreate: npx rimraf license-report && npx mkdirp license-report
scripts.create: npm run create:es6 && npm run create:react && npm run create:scss && npm run create:selenium && npm run create:nest
scripts.create:es6: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-client-es6 && npx move-file ../src-client-es6/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.es6.json
scripts.create:react: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-client-react && npx move-file ../src-client-react/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.react.json
scripts.create:scss: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-scss && npx move-file ../src-scss/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.scss.json
scripts.create:nest: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-server-nest && npx move-file ../src-server-nest/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.nest.json
scripts.report: npm run report:es6 && npm run report:react
